name: 1 create articles
topic: CREATE TABLE articles( article_id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, discovery_date data_type TEXT, title data_type TEXT UNIQUE, summary data_type TEXT, link data_type TEXT, published_date TEXT, source data_type TEXT, relevant data_type INT, table_constraints );
info:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS articles (
	discovery_date data_type TEXT,
   	title data_type TEXT,
	summary data_type TEXT,
	link data_type TEXT,
	published_date TEXT,
	category data_type TEXT,
	source data_type TEXT,
	relevant data_type INT,
	table_constraints
) ;

info:

query:
SELECT
	*
FROM
	articles
WHERE
	title LIKE (?);

SELECT
	*
FROM
	trials
WHERE
	title LIKE (?);
SELECT  * FROM trials where trial_id = ? ORDER BY trial_id DESC;
SELECT  * FROM articles where source = ? ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT  * FROM articles WHERE discovery_date LIKE ? ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT  * FROM articles where article_id = ? ORDER BY article_id DESC;

name: email template
template:
Digest of articles in the last 2 days


{{#payload}}

{{{title}}}

Discovery Date: {{discovery_date}}

  • ML GNB: {{ml_prediction_gnb}}
  • ML LR: {{ml_prediction_lr}}

{{{link}}}

Mark Relevant


---

{{/payload}}

sql:
SELECT *
FROM articles
WHERE sent_to_subscribers IS NULL
    AND relevant = 1;

template:
Good Morning, %recipient_fname%.

Here are the relevant articles we have found in the last 7 days

{{#payload}}

{{{title}}}

Discovery Date: {{discovery_date}}

{{{link}}}

--- {{/payload}}

For the full list, please visit https://gregory-ms.com/

For adding people to this email list or further information, please contact Bruno Amaral:

Mobile: +351 912 875 856

Email: mail@brunoamaral.eu

If you wish to unsubscribe, follow the link below.

Best wishes, Gregory. Your friendly research bot.

search-query
func:
msg.topic="select  article_id, discovery_date, title, summary, link, published_date, source, relevant, ml_prediction_lr,ml_prediction_gnb, sent from articles ORDER BY article_id desc";
return msg;

name: search-response
func: return msg;

name: insert-response
func:
msg.payload=msg.result;
return msg;

name: insert-query
func:
msg.topic="INSERT INTO articles (discovery_date,link,published_date,relevant,source,summary,title) VALUES ('" + msg.payload.discovery_date + "','" + msg.payload.link + "','" + msg.payload.published_date + "','" + msg.payload.relevant + "','" + msg.payload.source + "','" + msg.payload.summary + "','" + msg.payload.title + "');"
return msg;

name: lastname-query
func:
msg.topic="SELECT article_id, title as value FROM articles";
return msg;

name: lastname-response
func: return msg;

name: delete-response
func:
msg.payload=msg.result;
return msg;

name: delete-query
func:
msg.topic="DELETE FROM articles WHERE article_id='" + msg.payload.id + "'";
return msg;

name: update-response
func:
msg.payload=msg.result;
return msg;

name: update-query
func:
msg.topic="UPDATE articles SET discovery_date = '" + msg.payload.discovery_date + "', link = '" +  msg.payload.link + "', published_date = '" + msg.payload.published_date + "', relevant = '" + msg.payload.relevant + "', source = '" + msg.payload.source + "', summary = '" + msg.payload.summary + "', title ='" + msg.payload.title + "', sent = '" + msg.payload.sent +"' WHERE article_id='" + msg.payload.article_id + "';";
return msg;
